CustomField.description:
The reason why the participant left the meeting, where $name is the participant's username:
$name left the meeting. $name got disconnected from the meeting. Host ended the meeting. Host closed the meeting. Host started a new meeting. Network connection error. Host did not join. Exceeded free meeting minutes limit. Removed by host. Unknown reason. Leave waiting room. Removed by host from waiting room.
CustomField.label: ZoomParticipantLeaveReason
